A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend API server that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
User authentication and authorization system for coaches and users
Personality assessment functionality with interactive questionnaire interface
User profile creation and management with editable personal information
Coach profile creation and management with specialization and experience details
Search and filtering functionality for users to find suitable coaches
Matching algorithm or mechanism to suggest coaches based on personality assessment results
Scheduling system for booking one-to-one coaching sessions
Session management dashboard to view upcoming and past coaching sessions
Goal setting interface allowing users to define personalized coaching objectives
Progress tracking visualization to monitor goal achievement over time
Responsive web design with beige background and saddle brown colored components
Package.json configuration with 'install:all' script for frontend and backend installation
Package.json configuration with 'dev' script to start frontend and backend concurrently
